commit.message: Fix spacewalk-java jar symlinks on OpenSUSE Leap 15.2
fixup! Fix spacewalk-java jar symlinks on OpenSUSE Leap 15.2

nodes.bodyText: Is this really correct? I would have expected an "/" instead of "_" here. But I'm not a java developer :)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -666,14 +666,21 @@ chown tomcat:%{apache_group} /var/log/rhn/gatherer.log
 %{jardir}/dom4j.jar
 %{jardir}/dwr.jar
 
-%{jardir}/google-gson.jar
 %{jardir}/snakeyaml.jar
 # SUSE extra runtime dependencies: spark, jade4j, salt API client + dependencies
 %{jardir}/commons-jexl.jar
 %{jardir}/commons-lang3.jar
+%if 0%{?is_opensuse}
+%{jardir}/google-gson_google-gsongson.jar
+%{jardir}/httpcomponents_httpclient.jar
+%{jardir}/httpcomponents_httpcore.jar
+%{jardir}/httpcomponents_httpcore-nio.jar

nodes.bodyText: So if I understand correctly, the symlinks will not change, but in the code you are accessing them via the new path now. Right?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,3 +1,5 @@
+- Fix symlinks for gson, httcomponents on Leap 15.2
+
